RelatedWorksPlanPage.title: Published Research Outputs
RelatedWorksPlanPage.description: Match published research outputs to your research project.

RelatedWorksProjectPage.title: Published Research Outputs
RelatedWorksProjectPage.description: Match published research outputs to your research project.

PENDING.noResults:
No pending outputs found.
 You have no pending outputs to review.
PENDING.noFilteredResults: No pending outputs match your current filters.

ACCEPTED.noResults:
No published outputs found.
You haven’t marked any outputs as published yet. Check the Pending tab to get started.
ACCEPTED.noFilteredResults: No published outputs match your current filters.

REJECTED.noResults:
No rejected outputs found.
You haven’t rejected any outputs.
REJECTED.noFilteredResults: No rejected outputs match your current filters.

RelatedWorksListItem.title: Open the published version of this output

instructions.review: Review the information about this candidate published research output below, and then accept it as published or reject it as unrelated.

actions.PENDING: If you reject this output, you can recover it later from the Rejected tab.
actions.ACCEPTED: If you reject this output, you can recover it later from the Rejected tab.
actions.REJECTED: You can recover this output by accepting it, you will then see it in the Accepted tab.

AddRelatedWorkProjectPage.title: Add Published Research Output
AddRelatedWorkProjectPage.description: To manually add a published research output to a project, select a plan, then enter output's DOI below and click Lookup to find it. Click Accept to add the output to the project. You can run multiple searches on this page to add more than one output.

AddRelatedWorkPlanPage.title: Add Published Research Output
AddRelatedWorkPlanPage.description: To manually add a published research output to a plan, enter output's DOI below and click Lookup to find it. Click Accept to add the output to the plan. You can run multiple searches on this page to add more than one output.

RelatedWorksAdd.title: Add Published Research Output
RelatedWorksAdd.planSelectDescription: Select a plan to add a published research output.
RelatedWorksAdd.searchDescription: Enter the output's DOI in either short or URL form (e.g. 10.1000/182 or https://doi.org/10.1000/182), then click Lookup.
